conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.text: I want to know about your services.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: Jivus AI offers AI-powered search and conversational systems that enhance business workflows. Our tools help automate customer interactions and provide intelligent search solutions.

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.text: Can you tell me any product?

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: We have Jivus Search, an AI-driven search engine that understands queries contextually, and Jivus Chat, an interactive chatbot that provides conversational assistance.

conversation.speaker: customer
conversation.text: Can you give me price details?

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.text: Our pricing varies based on usage. We offer flexible plans starting at $300 per month for basic access, with enterprise solutions customized to meet high-volume requirements.
